p1

0b00000000 0b11111111 - neutral, nothing pressed, transmitting for some time after button was released
0b00000000 0b01111111 - A
0b00000000 0b10111111 - B
0b00000000 0b11011111 - select
0b00000000 0b11101111 - start
0b00000000 0b11110111 - UP
0b00000000 0b11111011 - DOWN
0b00000000 0b11111101 - LEFT
0b00000000 0b11111110 - RIGHT
0b01000000 0b11111111 - X
0b00100000 0b11111111 - Y
0b00010000 0b11111111 - Z/L1
0b00001000 0b11111111 - C/R1

p2 - same, but bit 7 in byte 0 is set to 1

0b10000000 0b11111111 - neutral, nothing pressed, transmitting for some time after buttons were released
0b10000000 0b01111111 - A
0b10000000 0b10111111 - B
0b10000000 0b11011111 - select
0b10000000 0b11101111 - start
0b10000000 0b11110111 - UP
0b10000000 0b11111011 - DOWN
0b10000000 0b11111101 - LEFT
0b10000000 0b11111110 - RIGHT
0b11000000 0b11111111 - X
0b10100000 0b11111111 - Y
0b10010000 0b11111111 - Z/L1
0b10001000 0b11111111 - C/R1
